name: The People Concern
review_text:
John Maceri is a great man, his experience contributes to the success of programs today. We need more guys like John in these seats.

The People Concern - Tiki Apartments

name: The People Concern
review_text: Where do I start omg. I was introduced to Joe or Jose I was told both names where used . He came and in arm manner made me think he was truth with and he had gotten my friend who had been at our shelter in 4 months. And although he had tendencies of disappearing I toolanchance as well all do for the greater good of having a home one day. So the nightmare begins . Tls is a program that remains a mystery and is not favored my housing navigators these mysterious people who hold the key don't like  that program because of low commissions I imagine .

name: The People Concern
review_text: This s a crummy agency.  This agency is against landlords, and will support the tenant's poor behavior

name: The People Concern
review_text: They are destroying my life even more than it already is. Just when I thought it couldn't get any worse.We end up with these snobby liars! They suck worse than anyone I've ever encountered! We' ve been at this hotel for 2 years trying to just get our foot in the door somewhere and we would be able to afford paying full rent. All they do is work on trying to split me and my wife apart. I am also her caregiver.They try to house her in a dangerous neighborhood in another facility not an apartment without me.Then because we refused it they threw me out of the program completely. She is a vulnerable adult and she doesn't have anyone but me. They will lie about pretty much everything they tell you.I enrolled in school and they said that disqualifies me from the program. They bully people, lie to people, treat you like a loser and a drug addict even if you don't use the drugs. Then when it becomes crunch time they manage to come up with a worse situation than we already were in. They will hack years off of your life with the dump truck load of stress they have for you.Dont worry that's plenty to last you through the 2 years of digging the rut you've already been stuck in. Now I understand why people commit suicide . All I can say is good luck to anyone who gets to experience them. Have a nice day! üôÇ

name: The People Concern
review_text: ABSOLUTELY THE WORST ORGANIZATION. THEY LIE, MANIPULATE AND DECIVE YOU. NO ONE CARES IF YOU EVER GET AN APARTMENT BECAUSE THEY WILL HOLD UP YOUR APPLICATION AND RUIN YOUR CHANCES OF GETTING AN APARTMENT.

name: The People Concern
review_text: They do have what they call as a serice and help. However they push everything on you and just give Lip Service

name: The People Concern
review_text:
The People Concern has been lying about everything regarding the apartment search process. Hands down the worst experience to be mislead and lied to while homeless and trying to find an apartment by the very people getting paid by Funds & Tax Payers money to HELP US NOT HARM US  RUN AWAY FROM THIS PLACE & LOOK UP LAWSUIT OF 2019.
UPDATE: THANK YOU FOR YOUR RESPONCE & IF YOU MEAN IT HELP ME FIND AN APARTMENT!

UPDATE TO PEOPLE CONCERN RESPONSE:

THIS IS THE WAY YOUR AGENCY IS THIS IS A GREAT REPRESENTATION OF HOW YOUR AGENCY WORKS. DISGRACEFUL

name: The People Concern
review_text:
On Oct 17th, my case manager called me to tell my that she would help me with my Section 8 on Oct 20th, 2023 on a Friday; quess what happened? I called her up at 8:00 a.m. to remind her. The call went to voicemail. The next call drop. The third time I texted her at I will be waiting at 09:20 a.m.
She never call back! Two days before Nov 1st deadline, she called me up and gave me the excuse: "I was in the field."
This company tries to get in your business and talk down to you. They zare there for the money and they promote drugs
use. They know people do drugs and tolerate it! They mess with the good clients and tolerate the bad ones. Stay away from this no good company!!

name: The People Concern
review_text: Helped me get housing

name: The People Concern
review_text:
Horrible abusive agency.  They are suppose to be my Case Managers but have not provided any program services since March of 2022.  In addition I've been abused by there staff and they never correct the problems, or do as promised.  They get paid a lot of money by the Los Angeles County Department of Health Services, but steal the money, waste it on excessive salaries and benefits while never properly servicing their clients.  They are fraudsters, scammer, liars, abusers and cheaters.  If I weren't forced to use them I would walk away as fast as I could.

Due to excessive abuse I had to report one of their Case Managers to the Adult Protective Services Civil and Criminal division today.  Her name is Talaya Smith for anyone who may have similar problems with her.  You can email me at my username above through gmail.

name: The People Concern
review_text:
You suck, you suck.
Make promises and you don't keep him.

name: The People Concern
review_text: The case workers are very rude and they talk so negative towards clients. Even after complaints they promoted the case workers to managers positions. One of the case workers (Cathy Carranza) show up to my ob appt for my pregnancy and lied to the Dr that I suffer from bipolar but I never been diagnosed I compliant cause the Dr were concerned with me and called DCFS based on her comments they promoted her to manager. They are supposed to help those in need of services to regain control of their life financially and to make housing more accessible. Yet they told me things like they have bachelor's degree and am just me. most work here to looked down on those in need I only met 3 that aren't rude and don't make you feel less than a human. When you finally get housing through them they keep you from finding employment and education training. They keep people at the bottom by not helping with food or bus tokens after housing assistance or putting limits that caused the person to remain unemployed. I had to find resources for them cause they didn't have any. I don't recommend them for housing assistance unless you ready to be talk to rudely and negative they talk like high schoolers. They took my chanel purse and my car after I lost my finances to my ex I experienced this I am one of the persons they did to. It's like they expect people to stop living or have a life cause they got housing assistance

name: The People Concern
review_text: your email doesn't work. youll enjoy my review of your access center in santa monica. if youre as bad as they are, which you probably are seeing as you don't have a non phone method of contact, you're about to be very upset. im a vampire.

name: The People Concern
review_text: I love the people concern they have helped me so much over the last 2 years with all my needs they helped me get total rehabilitation from food.Id.medical.treatment and the apartment of my dreams special thanks to Kelly Richard's the hardest working outreach worker I've met and I have met many thank you so much for all the help the people concern you definitely changed my life

name: The People Concern
review_text: The case worker assigned to me did not know anything about Section8 and neither did I. Still waiting to be housed. Doing my own case management. I did my own   apartment search, communication with property management. Paid for all my rental applications.  When I tried to ask for help the case manager was unresponsive. I asked for a different case manager and was told I couldn't switch. Extremely disorganized. Seems like they take the funding and run. Hopefully I will sign a lease soon. But now I am being told they might not have the funding anymore for the furniture they promised.

name: The People Concern
review_text: the worst most corrupt making big money off homeless and not doing anything to get people off the street

name: The People Concern
review_text: They take good care of you.. They really do help you..I am lucky to them!!

name: The People Concern
review_text:
Thank You All üôè Alex, Mandy, William, Grayce & Donna. I received my beautiful¬†bed frame today. I love it, it's perfect. Thank you for all of your support over this past year. The People Concern has helped me in life changing ways. You have been a valuable¬†resource and friends. I am truly grateful.
Sincerely,
Diane

name: The People Concern
review_text: The People's Concern, used to be called Lamp Community. My name is Monica P. Lamp Community gave me an opportunity to give back to others who are less fortunate than myself. I was a individual who was suffering from many impairments including Mental Illness. The trauma became very overwhelming and because of Lamp community I was able to gear others into a beacon of light. So that they may be able to solve their common problem. Helping them with tools that work by getting a results. My review today is to congratulate those who came through at that time. I'm here too say that I was the one who put the face on homelessness. Here to show the willingness to show others a way up and out by practicing tools that get results.With that said I'm so grateful and thank you once again the people's Concern for the opportunity.

name: The People Concern
review_text: I don‚Äôt know if this is indicative of how things are now, my case management, or The People Concern itself but I am a  60 year old woman with a disability who is homeless right now. I have a caseworker who, I was told, referred me to TPC in order to help get me housed. They indicated that I‚Äôd get another case manager there; they‚Äôd call me in order to do an intake. When no calls came, they called again, to no avail. Maybe a month later I called through a number I googled and I was advised that they weren‚Äôt able to give me details on whether I was assigned to someone unless I knew who my caseworker spoke to. My own caseworker didn‚Äôt remember, but said she would call again. Last week, I thought I‚Äôd go there and perhaps maybe speak with someone, do an intake but, no, they only wanted to speak with a caseworker. I sent an email to their site. On the site it implies you can go there for intake however as that was not my experience,  I asked for clarification. I told them my situation and let them know that I do need help as my situation is an unsafe one. My reply said nothing of doing an intake with them. They gave me the number of HUD and resources for the aging which doesn‚Äôt have case management resources which is why I tried going there in the first place. Homelessness is difficult enough without also being turned away from resources that are supposed to be placed there to supposedly help decrease the issue.

name: The People Concern
review_text:
This is more like an assisted living center for those who need medical attention.  For those who have faced a catraphobic situation due to gentrification or other cause, there is little to no services within their temporary housing situation.

The staff likes to gaslight and those who are competent to feel inadequate and their need to control everyone in a semi sedentary situation is mentally damaging to many.

Tonight it's Thanksgiving.  Wonderful donations have rolled in and from past experience we're sure that the staff member throws all donations away.

The shelters this organization serves needs a major overhaul in management.

The issues go deeper,  I feel people need to know that the homeless issues is not 100% on the homeless... a lot rests on the shoulders of LAHSA and the organizations

The people in charge need to have more educational skills

name: The People Concern
review_text:
At an event called the source at the central library I was met with rude behavior. I just continued to ignore it.. scheduled an appointment.. 3weeks later and no one even showed up. I called before and after to see if they were on schedule to come and the person's phone was off. Then I was met with a wild tone of voice from supervision like somehow I was the problem in all of this.

Confusion and poor performance is constantly and deliberately being created by these employees along with a fight and the intent to point fingers.

The lady was talking to me like I was some sort of slave. Dignity and respect is unfounded in their work ethic, along with an intent to inflict mental distress on those who are already in emergency and transitonal phases and socio-economic plights and down cycles. Instead of paying the tax, redirect them towards worthy causes and write the expense off.

This behavior here was atrocious

name: The People Concern
review_text: Good morning great people

name: The People Concern
review_text: I been having problems with my case manager Helen and Her supervisor Doris with my housing search I give Helen 40 Apartments to call for schedule appointment is been one month she wasn't returned my calls I left few messages to John Maceri ceo haven't return my call there getting money from having my name in there program and there not helping me there connect unprofessional unpleasant people.

name: The People Concern
review_text: I wouldn‚Äôt recommend coming here if you need homeless services. Staff needs more training and education

name: The People Concern
review_text:
Their concern is "the people"...they are "the people concern." Lol, I love their name!
But, it's not just a name for them, they really do give a...care.
Personally, I'm thankful that the case workers (mine was an angel) are quality people who are tenacious in the best ways. Katrina, specifically, helped me a couple years back in a big way that I'll never forget.

name: The People Concern
review_text:
ü§¶üèª‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚Ä¶(carelessness/negligence/time & workload mismanagement)
A very frustrating and disappointing experience that has taken a lot of time and has left me where I started : homeless! ‚Ä¶& soon without a voucher.
If you trust this program with the future outcome of your living situation and housing‚Ä¶well then all I can say is : hopefully you have better luck with your voucher &/or overall exp.

name: The People Concern
review_text: It's counseling headquarters, they don't do counseling there, but give you a number to call!

name: The People Concern
review_text: The way they treat case managers is absolutely disgusting. Underpaid and overworked with management being incompetent.

name: The People Concern
review_text: It's  ok what you look like. It's ok what's  in your past.  It's ok what set you're from or what God you worship. The People Concern staff don't discriminate and are really there to help not hate. They went that extra mile for me. They'll do the same for you. Take their out stretched  hand and let them assist you with your new stand. Just remember they can help you to your feet but it's up to you to beat those streets. They are a LIGHT showing you a safe way out.. You can do it, that's no doubt... real talk.. Thank you for being a LIGHT on my path. Author Jennifer L. Jackson

name: The People Concern
review_text: Concerned about the area

name: The People Concern
review_text: #Amazing #organization! Glad 2 know about these places (people #helping #people).

name: The People Concern
review_text: Helpful staff and overall a great organization

name: The People Concern
review_text: Above and beyond caring listening and helping

name: The People Concern
review_text: I've being under the ppls concern program through DHS n I'm still at the same place. My worker move on n I was told she was leaving n had know know replacement. These ppls need to now we're human being not some kind of electric light switch one turn on and off. It's not everyone that's down n out is on drug n don't care of their well being. Rises ppls play Russian Riley with human emotion n mislead them and then you're just another statistic or hopeless number while they can go n lay into their bed easily at the end of the day. It's sad the know one is writing or doing up on these organization. I think the best place so far that do show they care is the Downtown Women's Center on 4tj & San Pedro. They can be rude at times but it's mainly the staff that are heartless lime the security and desk clerk's. But once u get to know them things change n follow all the rules of do n don't. I'm puzzle know report them to the news as yet for the way they treat ppls as if they're incompetent. I pray each day that God will send someone in these homeless organization with more compassion n asked themselves what if these were my own family member seeking for help to better they living situation. May God have mercy on them........  This is not bring some on down but to express what's reality n cold headedness these business represent what PEOPLE CONCERN should really stand for........

name: The People Concern
review_text: Excellent social labor they realize, homelessness is a great problem in LA, not anymore thanks to the people concern

name: The People Concern
review_text: You'd actually believe the workers were sincere, upon talking  face to face, but while us clients are accountable for attending appointments, there seems no accountability for case managers & workers of lacking in efficiency . And no outlet for our voice as we live live, bearing the "detriment". They "do" have thier favorites, this is common knowledge  in this community,  and its "those" proffered  individuals  who do tend to get something  out  of it. And notice Ii said "sonething" ,but they are highly overrated by people not familiar with the true processes of let downs, which can eventually set us backwards & far worse off than when we 1st walked in the door to begin with, as far as hopelessness is concerned.

name: The People Concern
review_text: This place is the worst and every review is right if you want help you better help yourself I've had my voucher for one year they paid for one credit check I've had 6 case managers and nothing has been conducive and Rachel the supervisor is the worst they are keeping all the money this is APR front they need to shut this place down cuz this place is really taking the money but they are not helping the client they are not helping the people these reviews are right you guys should never use the people concern their fake they care about their selves case managers run off with clients information they will get back to you next week next month maybe next year

name: The People Concern
review_text: At one time this was a lamp and the lamp a beautiful community now it is a mockery

name: The People Concern
review_text:
They'll get back to you..next week.. maybe next month....... If you want to help yourself get a caseworker job.. that's where the money goes..
Its all image and PR..but its Hollywood isn't it.

name: The People Concern
review_text: Amazing services for less fortunate !!

name: The People Concern
review_text:
I have such a great growth from the direct staff and community art classes conducted at all locations..
The Peoples Concern has helped me in so many ways of growth and i will ever be indepted to them..but one short of their Rapid Rehousing Housing Advocate named Whitney Harvey
She has repeadely ignored and not done her outreach duties concerning checking on me monthly.She actually was not even interested in getting me housed and still has just completely abandoned me since July 2018.Since i had to complain and be literally forcefull in getting my section 8..which she embarassed me repeadely at the housing authority not being prepared at all!!..after many scoldings from Mrs.Andrews head of the division there..
Too this day iam totally lost.being new to this whole system of section 8.having severe PTSD ..acute anxiety..and Major depression..i have written a  grievance report and had meeting with Mr.Terence Lau that assured me her commitment to getting me housed.i turned in written statement to him also..but still have heard nothing from Ms.Harvey and my section 8 voucher is due to expire in 2 months.
I have not heard from her and know nothing about what my next steps are to being"#HealthyHousedSafely..
üòíüòíüòíüíß
